patterns: I want to activate/register a tag
responses: Sure, May I know which tag you have bought?

patterns: Key tag / Bag tag / Asset security tag
responses: Kindly send us your Full name / Email-id / Contact No. to register your tag
Kindly send us your Full name / Email-id / Contact No. / passport no. / passport expiry date to register your tag
Kindly install 'Dolphin Tracker' app from Google Play Store / iOS App Store and follow the steps

patterns: Couldn't connect Dolphin tracker to the app
responses: When installing the app, please make sure that all of the permissions have been granted.

patterns: Not getting separation alarm in Phone / Tracker
responses: Please enable notification from the app settings for the dolphin tracker.

patterns: The tracker does not reconnect after being disconnected.
responses: Please restart your Bluetooth and check once more.
If you didn't receive the verification email while creating an account, kindly check your spam folder as well.

patterns: How to activate genie pet tag
responses: Please register at https://dashboard.tag8.in/#/login or by scanning the QR code on the pet tag, which will direct you to the registration page.
Had your lost phone a 'Find my phone digital tag' app installed?

patterns: If Yes then Kindly send us your registered Email-id with 'Find my phone digital tag' app
responses: If not, kindly file a complaint at the local police station.

patterns: Couldn't connect Smart padlock to Dolphin tracker
responses: When installing the app, please make sure that all of the permissions have been granted.

patterns: If you're using the padlock for the first time, please charge it for 4–5 hours.
Unable to Unlock using Morse code
responses: Please send us the screen recording so we can assist you further
Please send us the screen recording so we can assist you further

patterns: App not showing the exact GPS location
responses: Kindly check the location services option from location settings and enable all options to improve accuracy

DOLPHIN tracker uses a replaceable coin/button battery (model CR2016). The battery can be replaced simply by opening the case and using the notch to pull it open. Remove the old battery and slip in a new battery.
If you're using the padlock for the first time, please charge it for 4–5 hours.
